code.name: EAN 13
code.description: A bar code of the AN/UPC Symbology that encodes GTIN-13, Coupon-13, RCN-13, and VMN-13.

code.name: EAN 13 COMPOSITE
code.description: An EAN_13 symbol with an additional CC-A or CC-B Composite symbol included at the top the EAN-13 symbol.

code.name: EAN 13 WITH FIVE DIGIT ADD ON
code.description: An EAN-13 with an additional five-digit symbol, called an Add-On Symbol that can be included on the item just to the right of the main bar code.

code.name: EAN 13 WITH TWO DIGIT ADD ON
code.description: An EAN-13 with an additional two-digit symbol, called an Add-On Symbol that can be included on the item just to the right of the main bar code.

code.name: EAN 8
code.description: A bar code of the EAN/UPC Symbology that encodes GTIN-8 or RCN-8.

code.name: EAN 8 COMPOSITE
code.description: An EAN-8 symbol with an additional CC-A or CC-B symbol included at the top of the EAN-8 symbol.

code.name: EPC ENABLED RFID TAG
code.description: A data carrier conforming to the GS1 UHF Gen2 RFID air interface standard, whose EPC memory bank contains an Electronic Product Code encoded according to the GS1 EPC Tag Data Standard

code.name: GS1 128
code.description: A subset of Code 1128 that is utilised exclusively for GS1 System data structures.

code.name: GS1 128 COMPOSITE
code.description: A GS1-128 symbol with an additional CC-A, CC-B or CC-C Composite symbol included at the top of the GS1-128 symbol.

code.name: GS1 DATA MATRIX
code.description: GS1 implementation specification for use of Data Matrix.

code.name: GS1 DATABAR EXPANDED
code.description: A bar code with a variable width (from 4 to 22 symbol characters, or a minimum of 102X wide and a maximum of 534X wide) and is 34X high (where X is the width of a module).

code.name: GS1 DATABAR EXPANDED COMPOSITE
code.description: A GS1 DataBar Expanded symbol with an additional CC_A or CC-B Composite symbol included at the top of the GS1 DataBar Expanded symbol.

code.name: GS1 DATABAR EXPANDED STACKED
code.description: A multi-row stacked version of GS1 Databar Expanded.

code.name: GS1 DATABAR EXPANDED COMPOSITE
code.description: A GS1 DataBar Expanded Stacked symbol with an additional CC-A, CC-B Composite symbol included at the top of the GS1 DataBar Expanded Stacked symbol.

code.name: GS1 DATABAR LIMITED
code.description: A bar code designed for small items that will not need to be read by omnidirectional Point-of-Sale (POS) scanners. Its dimensions are 74X wide, starting with a 1X space and ending with a 1X bar, by 10X high (where X is the width of a module).

code.name: GS1 DATABAR LIMITED COMPOSITE
code.description: A GS1 DataBar Limited Symbol with an additional CC-A or CC-B Composite symbol included at the top of the GS1 DataBar Limited Symbol.

code.name: GS1 DATABAR OMNIDIRECTIONAL
code.description: A full height, two-row version of the GS1 DataBar Omnidirectional Bar Code that is deisgned to be read by an omnidirectional scanner, such as a retail slot scanner.

code.name: GS1 DATABAR OMNIDIRECTIONAL COMPOSITE
code.description: A GS1 DataBar Stacked Bar Code Omnidirectional symbol with an additional CC-A or CC-B Composite Symbol included at the top of GS1 Databar Omnidirectional Stacked symbol.

code.name: GS1 DATABAR STACKED
code.description: The GS1 DataBar Stacked Bar Code is a reduced height two-row version of the GS1 DataBar Omnidirectional Bar Code that is designed for small items that will not need to be read by omnidirectional scanners.

code.name: GS1 DATABAR STACKED COMPOSITE
code.description: A GS1 Databar Stacked with an additional CC-A OR CC-B Composite symbol included at the top of the GS1 DataBar Stacked symbol

code.name: GS1 DATABAR STACKED OMNIDIRECTIONAL
code.description: A full height, two-row version of the GS1 DataBar Omnidirectional Bar Code that is designed to be read by an omnidirectional scanner, such as a retail slot scanner.

code.name: GS1 DATABAR STACKED OMNIDIRECTIONAL COMPOSITE
code.description: A GS1 DataBar Omnidirectional symbol an additional CC-A or CC-B Composite symbol included at the top of the GS1 DataBar Stacked Omnidirectional symbol.

code.name: GS1 DATABAR TRUNCATED
code.description: A reduced height version of the GS1 DataBar of the GS1 DataBar Omnidirectional bar Code that is designed for small items that will not need to be read by omnidirectional scanners.

code.name: GS1 DATABAR TRUNCATED COMPOSITE
code.description: A GS1 DataBar Truncated symbol with an additional CC-A or CC-B Composite symbol included at the top of the GS1 DataBar Truncated symbol.

code.name: GS1 QR Code
code.description: GS1 implementation specification for use of QR Code

code.name: ITF 14
code.description: ITF-14 (A subset of Interleaved 2-of-5) Bar Codes carry GTINs only on trade items that are not expected to pass through the Point-of-Sale.

code.name: NO BARCODE
code.description: Item packaging does not contain bar code.

code.name: RFID EPC TAG
code.description: Tagged with an RFID EPC tag.

code.name: UPC A
code.description: A bar code of the EAN/UPC Symbology that encodes GTIN-12, Coupon-12, RCN-12, and VMN-12.

code.name: UPC A COMPOSITE
code.description: A UPC-A symbol with an additional five-digit symbol, called an Add-On Symbol that can be included on the item just to the right of the main bar code.

code.name: UPC A WITH FIVE DIGIT ADD ON
code.description: A UPC-A with an additional five-digit symbol, called an Add-On Symbol that can e included on the item just to the right of the main bar code.

code.name: UPC A WITH TWO DIGIT ADD ON
code.description: A UPC-A Symbol with an additional two digit symbol, called an Add-On Symbol that can be included on the item just to the right of the main bar code.

code.name: UPC E
code.description: A bar code of the EAN/UPC Symbology representing a GTIN-12 in six explicitly encoded digits using zero-suppression techniques.

code.name: UPC E Composite
code.description: A UPC-E symbol with an additional CC-A or CC-B Composite symbol included at the top of the UPC-E symbol.

code.name: UPC E FIVE DIGIT ADD ON
code.description: A UPC-E with an additional five-digit symbol, called an Add-On Symbol that can be included on the item just to the right of the main bar code.

code.name: UPC E WITH TWO DIGIT ADD ON
code.description: A UPC-E Symbol with an additional two-digit symbol, called an Add-On Symbol that can be included on the item just to the right of the main bar code.
